basics.name: Ahmed Kordofani
basics.label: IT Professional
basics.summary: I'm an aspiring IT Professional with a growing interest in cybersecurity. I recently completed an intensive eight-week coding bootcamp at Makers Academy, which equipped me with Python programming skills and hands-on problem-solving abilities. Additionally, I deepened my understanding of cybersecurity through the Google Cybersecurity Specialization on Coursera. I'm dedicated to upholding digital asset integrity and confidentiality, and my goal is to enhance organizational security by uncovering potential threats and vulnerabilities. I'm eager to apply my skills and enthusiasm to contribute effectively to safeguarding digital landscapes in a cybersecurity role.

work.name: Makers Coding Bootcamp
work.summary: Actively participate in an intensive software development bootcamp with a focus on practical coding skills and best practices. Acquire proficiency in Python programming, including version control with Git and GitHub for managing project repositories. Develop problem-solving abilities through hands-on coding challenges and collaborative projects. Gain familiarity with agile development methodologies, fostering effective teamwork and project management skills.

work.name: Google Cybersecurity Program
work.summary: Actively participate in comprehensive cybersecurity training and coursework provided by Google. Engage in hands-on practical exercises to develop skills in areas such as network security, vulnerability management, and incident response. Collaborate with fellow participants to analyze and solve real-world cybersecurity challenges. Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in cybersecurity through self-study and research.

work.name: Generation UK IT Support Program
work.summary: Actively participate in technical sessions to gain an in-depth understanding of IT systems and troubleshooting methodologies. Develop effective communication and active listening skills to address end-users' technical issues. Cultivate a customer-centric mindset, emphasizing empathy and patience in providing support. Collaborate with peers in group projects to enhance teamwork and problem-solving abilities. Build time management skills for efficient task handling and meeting deadlines in a dynamic IT service desk environment.

projects.name: Active Directory Home Lab
projects.summary: This project showcases my skills in setting up an Active Directory (AD) home lab using Windows Server 2019 and VirtualBox. Additionally, it features a PowerShell script for bulk user creation in AD, creating 1000 users for testing and demonstration purposes.

projects.name: Makersbnb Project
projects.summary: During my time at Makers, I had the opportunity to work as part of a team on the 'Makersbnb' project, a web application that allowed me to apply and further develop my engineering skills and collaborate effectively within a team.

projects.name: Google Cybersecurity Portfolio
projects.summary: This portfolio serves as a comprehensive documentation of my experiences within the Google Cybersecurity Program. It encompasses a diverse range of hands-on activities, lab exercises, and projects, all designed to replicate the responsibilities typically undertaken by Entry-Level Security Analysts.

skills.name: Continuous learning and awareness of tech trends
